refentryinfo.title: Support scripts for releasing and CI environments

refnamediv.refpurpose: Support scripts for releasing and CI environments and handling deb and rpm repos.

para.screen: jss-debrepo-signcheck(1) ............ deb repo sign check jss-debrepo-update(1) ............... resigning packages and update deb repos jss-debrepo-repomanage(1) ........... debian version of repomanage jss-html-validator(1) ............... recursive html validator jss-jenkins-backup(1) ............... basic and simple jenkins backup jss-rpmrepo-update(1) ............... update rpm repos with default deleting policy and resigning jss-xml-validator(1) ................ recursive xml syntax/dtd/xsd validator

refsect1.title: SEE ALSO
refsect1.para: jss-debrepo-signcheck(1), jss-debrepo-update(1), jss-html-validator(1), jss-jenkins-backup(1), jss-rpmrepo-update(1), jss-xsd-validator(1).
